about_the_game:
Eternal Space

Eternal Space is a city management and a space exploration/combat game. Expand your city while you uncover the secrets in space.

Manage your city

Control your city your way. Keep your citizens happy by constructing Hospitals to keep them healthy and Police Hubs to keep them safe. Collect taxes each year for a little bonus too. Expand your city by constructing buildings and make your citizens happy.

Explore

Explore the Eternal Space. There is always something new out there.

Fight

Fight pirates, or become a pirate! Pirates earn a lot of credits, but that also comes at some risk.

Freighters

Purchase and manage your own Freighter at the cost of 5 milion credits! Craft Tritium-cells to be able to refuel it, jump with it to new locations and do things you never would be able to do without it!
